00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * This file contains defines for the ILA interface
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 49448 $<hr>
00046  *
00047  *
00048  */
00049 
00050 #ifndef __CVMX_HELPER_ILA_H__
00051 #define __CVMX_HELPER_ILA_H__
00052 
00053 #include "cvmx-helper.h"
00054 #include "cvmx-ilk.h"
00055 
00056 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00057 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00058 extern "C" {
00059 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #define CVMX_ILA_GBL_BASE 10 
00063 
00064 /**
00065  * This header is placed in front of all received ILA look-aside mode packets
00066  */
00067 typedef union {
00068     uint64_t u64;
00069 
00070     struct {
00071 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00072         uint32_t reserved_63_57:7;  /**< bits 63...57 */
00073         uint32_t app_spec0:15;      /**< Application Specific 0 */
00074         uint32_t chan1:1;       /**< Channel 1 XON */
00075         uint32_t chan0:1;       /**< Channel 0 XON */
00076         uint32_t la_mode:1;     /**< Protocol Type */
00077         uint32_t app_spec1:6;       /**< Application Specific 1 */
00078         uint32_t ilk_channel:1;     /**< ILK channel number, 0 or 1 */
00079         uint32_t app_spec2:8;       /**< Application Specific 2 */
00080         uint32_t reserved_23_0:24;  /**< Unpredictable, may be any value */
00081 #else
00082         uint32_t reserved_23_0:24;  /**< Unpredictable, may be any value */
00083         uint32_t app_spec2:8;       /**< Application Specific 2 */
00084         uint32_t ilk_channel:1;     /**< ILK channel number, 0 or 1 */
00085         uint32_t app_spec1:6;       /**< Application Specific 1 */
00086         uint32_t la_mode:1;     /**< Protocol Type */
00087         uint32_t chan0:1;       /**< Channel 0 XON */
00088         uint32_t chan1:1;       /**< Channel 1 XON */
00089         uint32_t app_spec0:15;      /**< Application Specific 0 */
00090         uint32_t reserved_63_57:7;  /**< bits 63...57 */
00091 #endif
00092     } s;
00093 } cvmx_ila_header_t;
00094 
00095 
00096 /**
00097  * Initialize ILK-LA interface
00098  *
00099  * @param lane_mask  Lanes to initialize ILK-LA interface.
00100  * @return  0 on success and -1 on failure.
00101  */
00102 extern int cvmx_ila_initialize(int lane_mask);
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * @INTERNAL
00106  * Return the link state of an IPD/PKO port as returned by ILK-LA link status.
00107  *
00108  * @param lane_mask lane_mask
00109  *
00110  * @return Link state
00111  */
00112 extern cvmx_helper_link_info_t __cvmx_ila_link_get(int lane_mask);
00113 
00114 /**
00115  * Enable or disable LA mode in ILK header.
00116  *
00117  * @param channel channel
00118  * @param mode   If set, enable LA mode in ILK header, else disable
00119  *
00120  * @return ILK header
00121  */
00122 extern cvmx_ila_header_t cvmx_ila_configure_header(int channel, int mode);
00123 
00124 /**
00125  * Reset ILA interface
00126  */
00127 extern void cvmx_ila_reset(void);
00128

00133 #endif
